products.productdescription: Konya blackoutporcelain whiteplain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion.

products.title: ThermoBlock Blackout White Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Thermoblock blackout white electric roller blind in white. Made to measure from 123.62 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their exclusive thermoblock range features soft neutral colours, on a polyester based blackout fabric. 
 
A whiteelectric roller blind easily brightens up the space,  and their thermoblock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. This off-white blackout roller has a silver uv-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter, a great option for hot offices or sunrooms. Their electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more difficult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. Why not pair with their smart hub - control your blinds from the comfort of your phone while away, or pair with amazon alexa or google home hub for a truly streamlined experience. 
 
At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years' experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This white electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
